February 2020

13 - Sample Event

Plan Your Own Event

If you would like to give an offering to support Cornerstone Presbyterian Church and its various ministries, you can do so in person with cash or check at one of our wooden Tithe & Offering boxes, located on the walls of the sanctuary during a Sunday service or other event.

We do not currently accept online or electronic giving, due to the percentage fee that is associated with electronic transactions; we believe that 100% of your generous donation should go to where you intended.

In addition to keeping the lights on at Cornerstone, your donation currently financially supports:
Millie Jenkins who is working through Youth With A Mission (YWAM)
Thurston County Food Bank
Union Gospel Mission
Young Life of Olympia

Want to offer your time instead of your money?
Volunteer Now
